description:
Dakota Payne has been running on the wrong side of the law for too long now, and it was only a matter of time before he got caught again, but lucky for him, Officer Beaux Banks isn't your typical cop. Officer Beaux can sympathize with Dakota's situation, and if he's perfectly honest, he wouldn't mind indulging in Dakota's house specialty, so he tells him he'll waive the charges if Dakota can give him proper incentive to let him go. Faced between doing hard time doing hard cock, Dakota makes the easy and obvious choice, and he soon discovers just how pleasurable the long arm of the law can feel.

Enjoy!
title: Caught With His Pants Down
